Token.Abstract: Enables packages by adding to cocos2d's search path and loading sprite sheets and filename lookups. Note: This method won't check a package's status and it is meant to be used for initialization of packages on startup by the CCPackagesManager. If a package is already among the search path then it won't be added again, spritesheets and file lookups not reloaded Sets the package's status to CCPackageStatusInstalledEnabled

Parameter.Name: packages
Parameter.Abstract: An array of CCPackage instance to be enabled

Token.Abstract: Disables packages by removing them fromcocos2d's search path after that reloading sprite sheets and filename lookups of remaining search paths. Note: This method won't check a package's status and it is meant to be used for initialization of packages on startup by the CCPackagesManager. Sets the package's status to CCPackageStatusInstalledDisabled*

Parameter.Name: packages
Parameter.Abstract: An array of CCPackage instance to be disabled
